recipe.title: Honey Lavender Soda Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 1 cup ; honey syrup, see recipe ; (335 g)

steps.step: Add the simple honey syrup and lavender to a small saucepan. Simmer over medium heat for 5 minutes, until slightly reduced. Let cool completely, then strain into an airtight glass container and store in the refrigerator for up to 2 months.
To serve, mix 1-2 tablespoons of honey lavender syrup with 8 ounces of seltzer water in a glass over ice.
Nutrition, per 1 tablespoon Calories: 16 Sugars: 4 grams

steps_updated.steps_updated: Add the simple honey syrup and lavender to a small saucepan.
Simmer over medium heat for 5 minutes, until slightly reduced.
Let cool completely, then strain into an airtight glass container and store in the refrigerator for up to 2 months.
To serve, mix 1-2 tablespoons of honey lavender syrup with 8 ounces of seltzer water in a glass over ice.
Nutrition, per 1 tablespoon Calories: 16 Sugars: 4 grams
